resume.name: TAM PARK

experience.description: Conducted data-driven research on stochastic modeling and mortality rate projections. Utilized R to perform regression analysis on historical demographic data, contributing to a published paper on long-term risk assessment in public pension funds.

Led a quantitative study on the impact of climate volatility on regional property insurance premiums. Built predictive models in Python to simulate catastrophic loss scenarios and extracted large-scale weather datasets using SQL to evaluate loss-ratio distributions.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
